meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels show 02271, with the tenths wheel clearly centered on 0. The red needle is pointing exactly at the 0.04 mark on the circular dial, or perhaps infinitesimally past the midpoint between 0.03 and 0.04, making 0.04 the closest 0.01 resolution. The expected range is 2000-3000 m³ and the reading 2271.04 is within this range.
